channel.title: Poker Tips Tricks & Strategy for the Intermediate Poker Player

item.title: Poker Podcast 36
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: A cheap and cheerful Sit N Go tournie for $5. Our drink of choice for the evening is Makers Mark. Not the longest of poker podcasts we've ever done but there are quite a good few cheeky moves that we pull out the bag.
item.content:encoded:
A cheap and cheerful Sit N Go tournie for $5. Our drink of choice for the evening is Makers Mark. Not the longest of poker podcasts we’ve ever done but there are quite a good few cheeky moves that we pull out the bag.

Download Poker Podcast 36

item.title: Poker Podcast 35
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: We play a lengthy deep tourney and we make a few decent moves. This podcast was made sans-alcohol so its fairly quiet, but hugely educational.
item.content:encoded:
We play a lengthy deep tourney and we make a few decent moves. This podcast was made sans-alcohol so its fairly quiet, but hugely educational.

Download Poker Podcast 35

item.title: Poker Vidcast 14
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Duff and Vster are back on a videocast due to popular demand. We start off in Vster Towers cooking up a bit of dinner for a pre-game feast before moving on to the poker and the alcohol!
item.content:encoded:
Duff and Vster are back on a videocast due to popular demand. We start off in Vster Towers cooking up a bit of dinner for a pre-game feast before moving on to the poker and the alcohol!

item.title: Poker Podcast 34
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Quite a placid podcast this time around with a strong focus on strategy and making the correct analytical play based on your position and your opponent's previous form.
item.content:encoded:
Quite a placid podcast this time around with a strong focus on strategy and making the correct analytical play based on your position and your opponent’s previous form.

Download Poker Podcast 34

item.title: Poker Podcast 33
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: We try new beer, discuss session drinking, the new Burger King nuggets, long sleeves, keytars and at some point we play a little bit of poker.
item.content:encoded:
We try new beer, discuss session drinking, the new Burger King nuggets, long sleeves, keytars and at some point we play a little bit of poker.

item.title: Poker Podcast 32
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Two for the price of one, Duff & Vster hit not one, but two online poker tournaments back to back. Not because we are amazing or anything but because we got absolutely filthed in our first tournie. Join in the fun and download the podcast now!
item.content:encoded:
Two for the price of one, Duff & Vster hit not one, but two online poker tournaments back to back. Not because we are amazing or anything but because we got absolutely filthed in our first tournie. Join in the fun and download the podcast now!

Download Poker Podcast 32

item.title: Poker Podcast 31
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: After a bit of a break Duff and Vster return to their roots of the audio podcast. We have a decent game and reccomend some decent beer too.
item.content:encoded:
After a bit of a break Duff and Vster return to their roots of the audio podcast. We have a decent game and reccomend some decent beer too.

item.title: Poker Vidcast 13
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Duff and Vster team up to take on the crème de la crème of the UKPPL tournament players in this end-of-season grand final. Join us as we fight for that top spot placement.
item.content:encoded:
Duff and Vster team up to take on the crème de la crème of the UKPPL tournament players in this end-of-season grand final. Join us as we fight for that top spot placement.

item.title: Poker Vidcast 12
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This is the UKPPL All-Stars tournament. See how we get on as we discuss beards, hats and technology. Oh, and poker!
item.content:encoded:
This is the UKPPL All-Stars tournament. See how we get on as we discuss beards, hats and technology. Oh, and poker!

item.title: Poker Vidcast 11
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Duff and Vster find themselves plonked into the thick of the action in the UKPPL Season 1 Semi-Final Poker Tournament. Follow our journey to the final table and click that play button.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Poker Vidcast 10
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Duff, alongside Vster, rack up a final table finish in the UKPPL tournament. A little less humour in this poker vidcast but with a few more tips and some good solid play.
item.content:encoded:
Duff, alongside Vster, rack up a final table finish in the UKPPL tournament. A little less humour in this poker vidcast but with a few more tips and some good solid play.

item.title: Poker Vidcast 09 Part 2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Part 2 of our lengthy online poker vidcast. Duff and Vster are still battling it out on the tables in the UKPPL Sunday tournament. Splitting a vidcast into two parts surely must mean that we did well. watch it now to find out!
item.content:encoded:
Part 2 of our lengthy online poker vidcast. Duff and Vster are still battling it out on the tables in the UKPPL Sunday tournament. Splitting a vidcast into two parts surely must mean that we did well. watch it now to find out!

item.title: Poker Vidcast 09 Part 1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Duff and Vster dive head-first into a monster multi-table sit-n-go online poker tournament to discuss tips, tricks and strategy. This vidcast is so big, we've had to split it into two parts! This is part 1.

item.title: Poker Vidcast 07
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Its a 100 seat tournament battle this time around. Watch us as we cut our way through the field and play a good agressive game at the start before getting drunk halfway through...
item.content:encoded:
Its a 100 seat tournament battle this time around. Watch us as we cut our way through the field and play a good agressive game at the start before getting drunk halfway through…

item.title: Poker Vidcast 06
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: We fancy our chances and have another crack at the UKPPL Sunday poker tournament. This show was pre-recorded on Sunday and voiced over at a later date. You'll get to see the table about 16 minutes in.
item.content:encoded:
We fancy our chances and have another crack at the UKPPL Sunday poker tournament. This show was pre-recorded on Sunday and voiced over at a later date. You’ll get to see the table about 16 minutes in.

item.title: Poker Podcast 30
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This is the audio taken from our Poker Vidcast 05 show. Duff and Vster storm their way on to a $5 10 seat SNG with the ultimate aim of dominating the game and taking down the win. Do we finally get that all elusive recorded 1st place win? You’ll have to watch the vidcast to find out!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Poker Vidcast 04
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: In this poker Vidcast we get ourselves signed up to the UKPPL Poker League and play in their private Sunday tournament on 888poker. We hit a very cold deck of cards and try our best to come out on top.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Poker Vidcast 03
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Duff and Vster team up to play some one-on-one heads up action. This poker vidcast contains some great tips and strategy for closing the final stages of any tournament and getting that elusive first place win.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Poker Vidcast 02
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Duff jumps on the controls for this solo flight as we whizz around a whistle-stop tour of quick tips, tricks and strategies for improving your No Limit Holdem game. Duff covers moves such as the Gap Concept, Continuation Betting, Aggression and more!
item.content:encoded:
Duff jumps on the controls for this solo flight as we whizz around a whistle-stop tour of quick tips, tricks and strategies for improving your No Limit Holdem game. Duff covers moves such as the Gap Concept, Continuation Betting, Aggression and more!

Download: Poker Vidcast 02

item.title: Craps Vidcast 01
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Duff and Vster crap out and take you to one of the most popular and loudest games you can find inside of a live casino. they teach you the basics of getting to grips with the game, which bets to play (and which ones to avoid) as well as reccomending some fine alcoholic drinks to accompany you as you play.
item.content:encoded:
Duff and Vster crap out and take you to one of the most popular and loudest games you can find inside of a live casino. they teach you the basics of getting to grips with the game, which bets to play (and which ones to avoid) as well as reccomending some fine alcoholic drinks to accompany you as you play.

Download: Craps Vidcast 01

item.title: Blackjack Vidcast 01
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Duff and Vster from Stonecoldbluff switch things up a bit with some lessons on how to play premium blackjack strategy. As usual we have a laugh and a giggle along the way. Come join us for our second casino game vidcast!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Pai Gow Poker Vidcast 01
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Duff and Vster teach you how to play the casino table game called Pai Gow Poker. They give you some tips, tricks and strategies for the game as well as some useful pointers to avoid some of the common beginners mistakes.
item.content:encoded:
Duff and Vster teach you how to play the casino table game called Pai Gow Poker. They give you some tips, tricks and strategies for the game as well as some useful pointers to avoid some of the common beginners mistakes. This video starts with some still images for a few minutes before the screen capture starts.

Download: Pai Gow Poker Vidcast 01

item.title: Poker Podcast 29
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Duff and Vster turn on the turbo boost and fly around the poker tables at breakneck speed as they share their thoughts, tips, tricks and strategies on Full Tilt’s Rush poker. Hold on tight! Download: Poker Podcast 29
item.content:encoded:

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Duff and Vster switch it up for one of our longest ever online poker podcasts. Learn about creating the right table image as well as timing when to make your move and switching gears. Download: Poker Podcast 26

item.title: Poker Videocast 01
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: We went digging in the SCB vaults the other night and came across thiss little gem that we don’t think ever really saw the light of day… until now. It’s a poker videocast with Duff and Vster as we play a bit of sit n go action and you can get it as a .WMV [...]
item.content:encoded:
We went digging in the SCB vaults the other night and came across thiss little gem that we don’t think ever really saw the light of day… until now. It’s a poker videocast with Duff and Vster as we play a bit of sit n go action and you can get it as a .WMV only (quality isnt great so don’t expect much).

Download: Poker Videocast 01

item.title: Poker Podcast 25
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Duff flies solo tonight to take you on his whistle-stop tour of the world of mini micro limit poker. He chats about the forthcoming Stonecoldbluff poker freeroll and also how to get your hands on some rather cool stonecoldbluff poker tshirt merchandise. Download: Poker Podcast 25
item.content:encoded:
Duff flies solo tonight to take you on his whistle-stop tour of the world of mini micro limit poker. He chats about the forthcoming Stonecoldbluff poker freeroll and also how to get your hands on some rather cool stonecoldbluff poker tshirt merchandise.

Download: Poker Podcast 25
